name: Perl Pop3 Server
short_description: PerlPop3 is a pop3 server written entirely in Perl. It is not memory hog as other pop3 servers, and pretty fast processing thousands of mails. Can be extended to use a database (and use APOP authentication). As a script can be modified as per your ne
